modpack.unlocks_root_desc: Unlock things to be added into spaceship's restock chest
modpack.unlocked_starter_item: This item is now permanently in your spaceship chest!
item.kubejs.drill.universal: This drill can mine all blocks that axe, shovel, hoe and pickaxe can
item.kubejs.drill_wooden.tooltip:
§oA pinnacle of primitive engineering, this drill surpasses any expectation of advanced caveman.

It sucks ass.
item.kubejs.drill_stone.tooltip: §oJust a smidge better at it is supposed to do.
